title: Local Editor UI
description: Implement a React-based UI that surfaces task lists, detail panes, and editors for checklists/logs/contracts, powered by the new backend.

context: Backend endpoints exposed under /api/* in src/server
Need React UI with JSON linting and task creation wizard
Must respect read-only vs write toggles for future remote monitor

expected_changes: Task board view showing status/priority badges sourced from backend
Detail pane showing task.json summary, editable checklist with `[ ]/[x]` toggles, log timeline, contract/prompt editors
Task creation wizard tied to POST /api/tasks, with validation before submit
JSON linting for contract/prompt editors preventing invalid saves
Manual test script verifying UI flows update underlying files via backend

acceptance_criteria: React UI surfaces task list and detail panes with live data from backend endpoints.
Checklist toggles and log timeline updates reflect backend responses and append NDJSON entries.
Task creation wizard successfully creates tasks via API and displays them in the UI.
Contract/prompt editors validate JSON before sending to backend; invalid payloads blocked client-side.
docs/local_editor_ui.md documents architecture, components, and manual test script; progress log updated with UI milestones.
notes: Use Vite or Next.js (client-side only) per repository constraints; prefer Vite + React for speed.
Consider state management with React Query or SWR; fallback to custom hooks if not adding dependencies.
Plan for remote monitor by keeping UI read-only toggle ready (no direct file writes from client).
